parameters.subject: ={{ $json.body.treatment.name }} Information - {{ $json.body.companyName }}
parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $json.body.customerName }},

Thank you for your interest in our {{ $json.body.treatment.name }} services at {{ $json.body.companyName }}.

We're excited to share detailed information about {{ $json.body.treatment.name }} with you. Please find our comprehensive brochure at {{ $json.body.treatment.brochureUrl }} that covers:

‚Ä¢ Treatment overview and benefits
‚Ä¢ What to expect during your visit
‚Ä¢ Pricing and package options
‚Ä¢ Before and after care instructions
‚Ä¢ Frequently asked questions

{{ $json.body.treatment.description }}

Next Steps:
1. Review the attached brochure
2. Contact us to schedule your free consultation
3. Ask any questions you may have

Contact Information:
üìû Phone: {{ $json.body.companyPhone || 'Contact us for details' }}
üìß Email: {{ $json.body.companyOwnerEmail }}
üåê Website: {{ $json.body.companyWebsite || 'Visit our website for more information' }}

We look forward to helping you achieve your dental goals!

Best regards,
{{ $json.body.companyName }}

This email was sent via our automated system. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.
